steps.title: Ship an MVP same day
steps.description: Use Claude Code / Rork / vibecoding to get a first MVP live the same day the idea forms.

resources.title: Claude
resources.description: Prompt + iterate quickly on an MVP.

steps.title: Tighten logic and edge cases
steps.description: Use Claude Code to tighten logic, handle edge cases, and make behavior predictable.

resources.title: Edge cases checklist (template)
resources.description: Use as a starting point for a QA mindset.

steps.title: Design for a 10-second demo
steps.description: Design the core interaction so it fits inside a 10-second screen recording from day one.

resources.title: Short-form storytelling basics (search)
resources.description: Study hook patterns relevant to your category.

steps.title: Study top short-form hooks
steps.description: Study top short-form videos in your category and write down the first 3 seconds of each.

steps.title: Build demos around the hook
steps.description: Build demos around the hook rather than the feature list (mindset shift).

steps.title: Record simple demos and post
steps.description: Record simple demos straight from the simulator or device and post them as is.

steps.title: Short-form as feedback channel
steps.description: Treat short-form video as a live feedback channel (very important).

steps.title: Test hooks before code
steps.description: Test multiple hooks for the same app before touching the code.

steps.title: Watch pauses and replays
steps.description: Watch where people pause, replay, or comment “wait what” to see what matters.

steps.title: Screenshot clarifying comments
steps.description: Screenshot comments that explain the product clearly and reuse that language.

steps.title: Cluster feedback into changes
steps.description: Paste comments into Claude Code and ask it to cluster feedback into concrete product changes.

steps.title: Ship the smallest clarity change
steps.description: Ship the smallest change that makes the demo clearer.

steps.title: Push changes fast and re-record
steps.description: Use Claude Code to push changes fast and re-record the demo the same day.

steps.title: Repeat until it explains itself
steps.description: Repeat this loop daily until the app explains itself without narration.

steps.title: Demo becomes distribution
steps.description: Let the demo become the distribution engine (north star).

steps.title: Add a paywall to test WTP
steps.description: Add a paywall once curiosity appears to test willingness to pay.

steps.title: Onboarding quiz (1 question)
steps.description: Add a one-question or short quiz in onboarding to create investment early.

steps.title: Personalize first output
steps.description: Use quiz answers to personalize the first output so it feels made for the user.

steps.title: Show result immediately
steps.description: Show the result immediately after onboarding to reinforce that the input mattered.

steps.title: One clear insight post-first-use
steps.description: Surface one clear “this is why this matters” insight right after first use.

steps.title: Save first output
steps.description: Save the first output so users feel ownership and return to it.

steps.title: Ask one follow-up action
steps.description: Ask for one small follow-up action after value appears to deepen commitment.

steps.title: Turn answers into new demo angles
steps.description: Turn common onboarding answers into new demo angles for content.

steps.title: Show progress over time
steps.description: Highlight progress or change over time with a simple before-and-after view.

steps.title: Trigger reengagement on meaningful change
steps.description: Trigger reengagement when the output meaningfully changes.

steps.title: Export/share with context
steps.description: Let users export or share their result in a way that preserves context (and drives virality).

steps.title: Improve onboarding copy
steps.description: Continuously improve onboarding copy with Claude Code based on what converts.

steps.title: Lock in the hook
steps.description: Lock in the hook when people start explaining the app to each other.

steps.title: Increase posting volume
steps.description: Increase posting volume after the format proves consistent. Keep experimenting.

steps.title: Shape product around what performs
steps.description: Shape the product around what performs on video.

steps.title: Ship → demo → observe → tighten → charge
steps.description: TLDR: Ship → demo → observe reactions → tighten the loop → charge → repeat until momentum compounds.

steps.title: PMF incoming (hopefully)
steps.description: If PMF is incoming: take dividends, reinvest in new apps (buy or build), or raise VC if you fancy that.

steps.title: You built a mobile app with AI
steps.description: You just built a mobile app with AI.
